TITLE GOES HERE:  Use the `dbConnect_scidb` function to connect to the `airlines` database to answer the following problem.
How many domestic flights flew into Dallas-Fort Worth (DFW) on May 14, 2010?

  
<!--begin-answer-->
```{r, warning = FALSE, message= FALSE}
library(RMySQL)
con <- mdsr::dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "airlines")

myquery <- "
SELECT sum(1) as N
FROM flights o
WHERE year = 2010 AND Month = 5 AND day = 14
  AND dest = 'DFW';"

dbGetQuery(con, myquery)
```
<!--end-answer-->
